ai.summary: A 7.2 km moderate urban walk called Jubilee Walkway (City Loop) that loops through city streets, parks, and riverside paths in the UK.
ai.terrain_summary: Primarily paved sidewalks and urban paths. Some gravel sections and stair steps may occur. Expect frequent street crossings, mostly flat to gently rolling terrain, and potential crowds on weekends.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on marked routes and cross streets at signalized crossings. Be aware of cyclists and pedestrians in busy city areas. Daylight is variable; bring a light jacket and water. Wear sturdy, comfortable shoes and watch for uneven surfaces or steps, especially after rain. Have a plan for weather changes and carry a phone for navigation.
recommended_gear: Phone with GPS and emergency contacts
ai.best_seasons: Year-round in the UK; however, spring to autumn offer the most comfortable conditions and daylight; be prepared for rain and sudden changes in weather.

seo.meta_description: Discover Jubilee Walkway (City Loop), a 7.2 km moderate urban hike through UK city streets and riverside paths. Terrain insights, safety tips, best seasons, and gear.
